document.docAuthor: Haddad, Charles R., Lyle, Robin, Bosselaers, Jan & Ramirez, Martin J.
document.docTitle: Austrachelas pondoensis Haddad, Lyle, Bosselaers & Ramirez, 2009, n. sp.
document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the endemic South African spider genus Austrachelas, with its transfer to the Gallieniellidae (Arachnida: Araneae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the endemic South African spider genus Austrachelas, with its transfer to the Gallieniellidae (Arachnida: Araneae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Etymology . This species is named after the Pondoland region in the Eastern Cape Province, South Africa .
Male. Measurements: CL 4.78 , CW 3.58 , FL 0.32 , AL 5.30 , AW 2.55 , SL 2.60 , SW 1.92 , TL 10.32 , AME–AME 0.10 , AME–ALE 0.03 , ALE–ALE 0.43 , PME–PME 0.07 , PME–PLE 0.14 , PLE–PLE 0.63 .

Type material
: Holotype Ƥ, deposited together with 13 and 7 Ƥ paratypes : SOUTH AFRICA : Eastern Cape Province , Lusikisiki district, Mzimhlava River mouth,
31 ° 20 'S
,
29 ° 40 'E
,
II. 1980
, M.E. Baddeley (coastal evergreen forest) ( MRAC 163974 ).

Additional material examined : Same data as types , I.1980, 12 Ƥ 13 ( MRAC 159047 , SEM preparations MJR-
1031 -1038
,
1063- 1065
, temporary mount CJG-00154); I.1980, 13 ( MRAC 166821 , SEM preparations MJR-01039, MJR-01040, temporary mounts CJG-00155, CJG-00156).
